cont: # email-system-nodejs ## About The Project email system like gmail yahoo .. features: * login * registration * send email with attached fiel * downlode attached file with email * replay the email ## Technologies * node.js * express js * ejs * javascript * mongose * html * css * multer * passport js ### screenshot [smile]: smile.png {: height="36px" width="36px"} ![image info](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/IMG_logo_%282017%29.svg){ width=50 }
